issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Add features to allow opting out of dependencies
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9290](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9290). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The build time of the parquet crate is mostly driven by dependencies that are not completely essential. A user should be able to not compile them if they know they are unnecessary.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9290?focusedCommentId=17150628) by Chao Sun (csun):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7610
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7610>
